tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hand_geometry_templates (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hand_template BLOB NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE departments (
    department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    department_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE HandGeometryData (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 employee_id INT NOT NULL,
 hand_template BLOB NOT NULL,
 hand_image BLOB,
 created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
 updated_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE EmployeeData (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 employee_id INT NOT NULL,
 first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 employee_image BLOB,
 department VARCHAR(50),
 created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
 updated_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE DepartmentData (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 department_id INT NOT NULL,
 department_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 supervisor_id INT NOT NULL,
 created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
 updated_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE SupervisorData (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 supervisor_id INT NOT NULL,
 full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 phone_number VARCHAR(15),
 created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
 updated_at TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE EmployeeHandGeometries (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hand_template_data VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeeAccessLog (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  access_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES EmployeeHandGeometries(employee_id)
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeeDetails (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Department (
  department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  department_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeeDepartment (
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  department_id INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (employee_id, department_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES EmployeeHandGeometries(employee_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (department_id) REFERENCES Department(department_id)
)
